entry.title: "So, What may bring you to work for Acme Corporation?"
entry.summary:
I have been recently contacted by a recruiter from a well-known global tech company in Linkedin:

I am contacting you today since your LinkedIn profile caught my attention while searching for Cloud Architect at Acme Corporation.

I politely declined the offer:

Thanks for reaching out. This isn't a good fit for me now, but let's keep in touch.
